```{r setup}
library(iffitoR)
```

We only need to have the right paths at hand and the function `make_shapefile` will (hopefully) return an object of type `sf`

Now we can already call the function

```{r}
res_sf = make_shapefile(database_dir = "/Users/robin/eurac/iffitoR/inst/extdata/",
                        attribute_database_name = "test",
                        dictionary_database_name = "dic_db",
                        shape = "/Users/robin/eurac/iffitoR/inst/extdata/IFFI10_1.shp",
                        attri=c("anno_min", "mese_min"))
```



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
res_sf %>% filter(anno_min > 1990) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(color=anno_min)) +
  scale_color_continuous(low="white", high="darkgreen")

``
